author: chfast
content: Is EIP-7825 going in? With 30M value?

author: jochembrouwer
content: Have we discussed the point to limit it to `2^24-1` (`16_777_215`) instead of the 30M to kick it out of potential mempool txs quicker (before RLP decoding)? 30M choosen for previous block gas limit, the alternative is obviously lower (and has the side-effects that max initcode size / max code deposit size has a lower hard cap), but would likely be the go-to target if previous block gas limit was about 16M and not 30M for the quick txpool check
